channel.title: Evil class, showed in Blue on final scoreboard
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I was Physician, became Ritualist. Final scoreboard showed me as Ritualist...in blue.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Should've been Ritualist in red
#### Steps to reproduce:
NFI. See the screenshot below for enough info to hopefully track down game, which ended ~5 minutes before this message. I'm player #7. Looks like #9 also shows in blue incorrectly.
#### Comments:
https://i.imgur.com/rXlcENX.jpg
